name: serverest-api-test-automation
description: Projeto de automação de testes de API do ServeRest

scripts.cy:run:all:headed: npm run cy:run:chrome:headed && npm run cy:run:firefox:headed && npm run cy:run:webkit:headed
scripts.cy:run:all:headless: npm run cy:run:chrome:headless && npm run cy:run:firefox:headless && npm run cy:run:webkit:headless
